query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/Card.tsx` using JSX (TSX) that:

1. Renders a card with a CSS class "card card-bordered"
2. Has a header section with class "card-header"
3. Has a body section with class "card-body"
4. Accepts `title` and `content` props
5. Displays the title in the header and content in the body

Use proper Vue JSX conventions for attributes.
